divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving one of my usual routes from California to the Phoenix Arizona area on Interstate 10. I had plenty of daylight still and saw a bright light low on the horizon about 5-10 miles directly east of me.Curios why any aircraft would have their headlamps on and realized from passing by several California and Arizona airports at various times of day and night this wasn't a usual size and brightness. As the craft and all on the Interstate got closer it was a disc shaped, but was huge, probably 300 feet across, the edge was about 10 feet tall and sloped slightly towards the middle where it could have an estimated height of 20 feet at its center. The CB radios started clamoring "Did you see that, The thing was huge. We are being invaded"
